verbs.description: [ARG0: Britain] [V: threatened] [ARG1: retaliation] [ARGM-TMP: last night] [ARGM-TMP: as Trump triggered a global trade war] . International Trade Secretary Liam Fox said the UK would not rule out counter - measures over the ' patently absurd ' tariffs .
